description:
DOWNSIZERS, this one's for you!

SET IN PRESTIGIOUS Mount Lofty - the signature suburb of Toowoomba's north-east corner - this Home Sanctuary will ensure the rest of your life is the best of your life.



IT'S an abounding haven.

IT'S cheaper than a 3 Bedroom Townhouse.

AND it's FULLY RENOVATED to the highest standard - with a garden that says: ' Beautify me, beautify me ... my red volcanic soil is perfect for organic gardening !! '



IN A MOMENT, let's take a deep-dive inside at this very special home presented by Jacqui Walker.



BUT FIRST - WHY TOOWOOMBA?

::: Demand outstrips supply in Toowoomba ... there's NO DOWNTURN forecast

::: Mount Lofty is a highly-regarded, preferred Toowoomba suburb

::: Continued CAPITAL GROWTH is anticipated due to significant infrastructure projects

::: Wow! Sir Richard Brandon's chosen global location for next satellite launch site and
Spaceport !!

::: Fast rail to Brisbane and new airlines taking off from Wellcamp Airport

::: Australia's fastest-growing regional city, where city meets country

::: Toowoomba is a key strategic link in the National Land Transport Network

::: 80 mins drive to Brisbane, flights available

::: Under 2 hours drive to Gold Coast



SO ATTRACTIVE, 7 Spies Court says ' Hello, come on in... '

SO, LET'S DO THAT:

- Enter to discover the OPEN-PLAN LIVING ROOM
::: Definitely created for relaxation
::: Reverse-cycle air conditioning adds comfort

- This spills to a brand-new KITCHEN worthy of a MAGAZINE COVER
::: With north outlook to capture the whole day's lovely passing sun
::: Gather at the ISLAND COUNTER and watch the Master Chef cook up a storm
::: Gourmet 900mm 6 burner Chef's oven
::: Stone surfaces

- Beautiful floating timber floors
- Attractive carpentry and joinery embellishments

- 3 spacious bedrooms
::: Each bedroom here feels like a sanctuary
::: Main bedroom with ample built-in robes
::: Bedroom 2 with a ceiling fan

- Majestic bathroom experience
::: Created for the pampered life
::: Shower over MAGNIFICENT BATHTUB
::: And a gorgeous vanity

- Private toilet
- Handy linen cupboard to hallway

- And doing the laundry will never feel like a chore again
::: Stunning integration to one-side of kitchen area
::: It's so attractive, so functional



NOW DISCOVER OUTSIDE:

- Rich volcanic soil
::: An array of blank canvas garden beds
::: Design your own botanical garden
::: Start your own perma-culture organic garden
::: Just imagine your crop of fresh vegetables
::::: Complementing the established fruit trees already here!

- 718 Sq Mtr allotment

- Special cul-de-sac position

- A detached single carport
- Gorgeous deck area to the front of home
- And a lovely deck area at the home's rear

- There are TEN SOLAR PANELS to the home's roof

- Choice of some lovely spots in the rear private yard for a quiet cuppa
- Also a rainwater tank
- 2 handy garden sheds
- And security screens for added peace-of-mind



HERE in the beautiful NORTH-EAST CORNER of Toowoomba,
WHAT'S NEARBY?

- 110 metres east of Southern Cross Reserve and Bushland
- 600 metres to Toowoomba State High School, Mt Lofty Campus
- 1.8km to Harlaxton Primary School
- 1.9km to Wendland Fine Foods ... Cafe ... Thai ... and a Beauty Salon
- 2.2km to Toowoomba's beautiful Botanic Gardens, leading to Queens Park
- 2.3km to Downlands College
- 2.9km to park-side Valetta Cafe and Parkhouse Cafe
- 3.0km to Fairholme College
::: Access the Jubilee Circuit CYCLING / WALKING TRACK
::: At the end of Wirra Wirra Street
::: Here, enjoy some of the best bush-walking and mountain-bike riding in Toowoomba
- 3.1km to Strand Cinemas
- 3.3km to Toowoomba Anglican School
- 3.4km to the Empire Theatre
- 3.8km to Grand Central Shopping Centre / CBD



CROWNED IN blissfulness and abounding with joy, you'll love this home on a special 718 Sq Mtr allotment ... you'll love the cul-de-sac position ... and you'll love the sensational PRESENTATION.

LIVING HERE will feel like you're on a unique homestay getaway every day! It's perfection.

RIGHT NOW, The Jacqui Walker Sells Team is ready to answer your questions or arrange your Inspection. SEE MAGAZINE-COVER GLAMOROUSNESS NOW!




***USEFUL INFO with compliments of The Jacqui Walker Sells Team:

- By negotiation, the furniture is available for purchase

- Orientation to Street: South

- Recent General Rates and Charges: $1,436.89 net 1/2 yr
- Recent Water Infrastructure Charge: $314.60 net 1/2 yr + consumption
- Local Government Area: Toowoomba Regional Council

- State School Zone: Harlaxton Primary, P-6; Toowoomba State High, 7-12
- Allotment Size: 718 sq mtrs

- Disclaimer: All care taken, however you are encouraged to independently verify all figures, measurements and indications.
